Articles.Content:
In my latest career game I did something I hadn't done much before: Planting Flags. Everywhere.

Making history should leave some traces, so I have been marking every important landing with a Flag.

Now my game claims I have 24 flights in progress, while 21 of those are simple flags planted at all kinds of interesting locations.

Debris is not shown as 'Flight in Progress', and only visible in the map view on request.

Can Flags be excluded from the 'Flights in Progress' list? But still show up in the map view on request?

Edited October 31, 2013 by OrtwinS
some improvements

I think if you click (right-click?) the flag icon at the top of the tracking screen it hides flags from both the list and the map. I don't think there's a way to keep them visible on just the map though.

Would be nice if the game treated them the same way as debris, not counting them as flights (toggleable like debris) but still showing them on the map (separately toggleable).
